item.title: RS2 317 Protocol Details
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

All packets are sorted numerically by their opcode.
Server > Client

ID: 27
Info: shows enter amount interface on chatbox
Size: 0
Payload: none

ID: 126
Info: write text to interface
Size: variable
Payload: {
String(varied size), // text to write
UInt16[A] // line to write to
}

Client > Server

ID: 3
Info: client focus changed
Size: 1
Payload: {
UByte // 1 for focus gained; 0 for focus lost
}

ID: 53
Info: use item on item
Size: 12
Payload: {
UInt16, // slot of item used on (from 0 - 27 inclusive)
UInt16[A], // slot of item used (from 0 - 27 inclusive)
UInt16[Big Endian][A], // item id of item used on
UInt16, // inventory interface id?
UInt16[Big Endian], // item id of item used
UInt16 // inventory interface id?
}

ID: 72
Info: attack npc
Size: 2
Payload: {
UInt16[A] // npc index
}

ID: 86
Info: camera angle
Size: 4
Payload: {
UInt16, // Camera Y
UInt16[A] // Camera X
}

ID: 95
Info: update chat settings
Size: 3
Payload: {
UByte, // Public chat: 0 = on, 1 = friends, 2 = off, 3 = hide
UByte, // Private chat: 0 = on, 1 = friends, 2 = off
UByte // Trade/compete: 0 = on, 1 = friends, 2 = off
}

ID: 101
Info: save settings on char design interface
Size: 13
Payload: {
UByte, // gender: 0 = male; 1 = female
UByte, // head
UByte, // jaw
UByte, // torso
UByte, // arms
UByte, // hands
UByte, // legs
UByte, // feet
UByte, // hair color
UByte, // torso color
UByte, // legs color
UByte, // feet color
UByte // skin color
}

ID: 103
Info: command packet
Size: variable
Payload: {
String(varied size) // the text typed after ::
}

ID: 130
Info: sent when "close window" is clicked on an interface
Size: 2
Payload: {
UInt16[A] // interface id
}

ID: 181
Info: cast spell on ground item
Size: 8
Payload: {
UInt16[Big Endian], // item x coordinate
UInt16, // item id
UInt16[Big Endian], // item y coordinate
UInt16[A] // spell id
}

ID: 185
Info: clicking buttons ingame
Size: 2
Payload: {
UInt16 // button id
}

ID: 202
Info: idle logout packet (sent if player is inactive for 90 seconds)
Size: 0
Payload: none

ID: 241
Info: mouse click packet
Size: 4
Payload: {
Int32 // ((# of milliseconds since last click / 50) << 20) + (is right mouse click ? 524288 : 0) + (mouseY * 765 + mouseX)
}

If I decide to post more, Iâ€™ll edit this post.
I think this should be stuck too.
Something like this actually was stuck in the server help section before the server development section was made (except it was only packet descriptions).

Read full topic

item.title: RS2 317 Protocol Details
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

I plan to start a proper list of packets from Server <> Client, their types, idâ€™s, payload and possibly what they do.

If anyone else would like the help (no not ripping code from your leeched sources, but setting the layout similar to mine, feel free to post)

I do hope this getâ€™s stickied, encourages the rest who are capable to help me (and maybe, just maybe the current nice frameworks will actually get developed, instead of the capable ones thinking (**** theres no documentation on this, i am not gonna run my eyes through 1.4mbs of wL server code to find what i need)

//Namings
byte > Byte
short > Int16
int > Int32
long > Int64

Unsigned will have U before the type, if not will represent it signed.

(Note: Sizeâ€™s do not include IDâ€™s/length)

Server > Client

ID:null
Info: Login Reponse
Size: 3
Payload: {
Byte, // login resopnse
Byte, // player group
Byte // flag
}

ID: 109
Info: Send Logout
Size: 0
No Payload.

ID:249
Info: Login Packet
Size: 3
Payload: {
UByte, // Members 1, else 0.
Int16 [A] // player id
}

ID:253
Info: Send Message
Size: Varied Bytes
Payload: {
String(varied size) // the message
}

ID:176
Info: Send Login Window
Size: 10
Payload: {
Byte, // recovery changed? // unknown
Int16, [A] // messages? i assume how many message you received
Byte, // member warning 1, else 0.
Int32, [A] // last login ip
Int16 [Big Endian] // last login
}

ID:206
Info: Privacy Settings
Size: 3
Payload: {
Byte, // privacy setting 0
Byte, // privacy setting 1
Byte // privacy setting 2
}

ID:134
Info: Send Stat
Size: 6
Payload: {
Byte, // stat number
Int32 [Middle Endian 1] // exp
Byte // current stat
}

ID:71
Info: Login Packet
Size: 3
Payload: {
Int16, // form id?
UByte // menu id
}

ID:107
Info: Unknown (but needed?)
Size: 0
No Payload

ID:73
Info: Map Area
Size: 4
Payload: {
Int16 [A] // region x
Int16 // region y
}

Client > Server

ID: 3
Info: Client Focus Changed
Size: 1
Payload: {
UByte // 1 for focus gained; 0 for focus lost
}

ID: 95
Info: Update Chat Settings
Size: 3
Payload: {
UByte, // Public chat: 0 = on, 1 = friends, 2 = off, 3 = hide
UByte, // Private chat: 0 = on, 1 = friends, 2 = off
UByte // Trade/compete: 0 = on, 1 = friends, 2 = off
}

ID: 103
Info: Command Packet
Size: Variable
Payload: {
String(varied size) // the text typed after ::
}

ID:4
Info: Public Chat
Size: 10
Payload: {
Byte, // chat text effects?
Byte, // chat text color?
Size - 2, // chat text size
Byte[], // remaining data = chat message
}

Type/Byte Orders: (each unknown type will be given a character)

Int16:
Order: [little Endian]
Bytes:
int
int >> 8

Int16:
Order: [Big Endian]
Bytes:
int >> 8
int

Int16:
Order: [A]
Bytes:
int >> 8
int + 128

Int32:
Order: [A]
Bytes:
int >> 16
int >> 24
int
int >> 8

Int32:
Order: [Middle Endian 1]
Bytes:
int >> 8
int
int >> 24
int >> 16

Int32:
Order: [little Endian]
Bytes:
int
int >> 8
int >> 16
int >> 24

Int32:
Order: [little Endian]
Bytes:
int >> 24
int >> 16
int >> 8
int

Int64:
Order: [Big Endian]
Int32 [Big Endian] (2x): // adding 2 integers, not bytes.
int64 >> 32
int64 & -1L

Int64:
Order: [little Endian]
Int32 [little Endian] (2x): // adding 2 integers, not bytes.
int64 & -1L
int64 >> 32

Read full topic
